title: rito please listen
body: OK lets clear this one thing up i'm not putting down your champions, i love most but some are a little shitty (no offence but i know you know *cough* yi *cough*) i just want to let you guys know that you need to put more thought into your champions, your sort of shoving these champs down our throat and not all of them make sense, like Azir i mean he is a nice champ but his ult is..... it just doesn't  seem like your putting much thinking into your  creations, im getting this vibe that your trying to have more champs than Dota but thats a bit of a long shot, dont get me wrong i like mostly all of your champions but theres not much balance between them like for example,morgana stun is single target when lux's bounces (im not sure of this but from what i know morgs doesn't) i would just like some really really nice champions that people will play not shun off cos there are champs that are so well thought out and i congratulate you on them, just consider the following please rito.

replies.body: I'm sure they are gonna slow down with champions. Just kinda makes sense to introduce a handful at the end of season.

OK lets clear this one thing up i'm not putting down your posts, i love most but some are a little %%%%ty (no offence but i know you know cough this one cough) i just want to let you guys know that you need to put more thought into your posts, your sort of shoving these posts down our throat and not all of them make sense, like I think you see where I'm going with this.

> morgana stun is single target when lux's bounces

Did you really just make that argument? Morgs *snare* (not stun) does a lot more damage than Lux's and also lasts longer, hence why it is only single target compared to Lux's double target snare. One question OP, are you John Snow?
haha ok thank you, but it was a example there are other instences which i could name if it wasnt 12:00 at night
to be honest dude i'd like to see a few instances named because there are some tidbits that are annoying but overall riot generally works toward Skill>champ picks

Azir has been in development for like 2 years, I am pretty sure they went through a lot of thought for him.

Dota's champs are all mechanically broken, intentionally so, hence the game is highly balanced around counter picking, hence also why they can't adopt LoL's f2p model. LoL is slightly different in this regard.

first off im not igniting argument here
second i did not imply that Dota's champs are more thought out i said that Rito was maybe trying to catch up
thirdly i didnt say Azir was forced in i was talking about the current burst of champs being presented to the lol community (kalista, Gnar, Rek'sai) you must admit they have come out very fast.
and to go in further description i wasn't trying to say lol champs are not good or their ability's are stupid (cough* yi cough*) i was talking about the fact that there are so many good champs such as rengar, khazix, zed, yas, to be honest Rek'Sai by the looks of it ect i would just like some more champs that give their exotic, rewarding feal. thankyou, 
P.S support arcade corki i love the idea

> thirdly i didnt say Azir was forced in i was talking about the current burst of champs being presented to the lol community (kalista, Gnar, Rek'sai) you must admit they have come out very fast.

And there is a good reason for it. Riot did state a while back that, because earlier champs this year had been delayed, they would be releasing a few champs in quicker succession than normal. Do you even pay attention to announcements or are you just new?

ummm, well i'm sorry for the abrupt comment,i didnt have enough knowledge to express my thoughts as i thought i could, but im not trying to get at that these champions being brought out faster than normal, i was looking at, in my own opinion, that the champions that are being brought out now don't come near, again in my opinion, to the former champions such as the ones i listed
